mapper.sql: id, target_id, company_id, project_id, type, major_name, user_name,seq,task_id
mapper.select: select a.*,b.user_name,b.user_id from maoding_web_project_task_responsibler a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user b on a.target_id = b.id where a.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.type=1

select a.id,a.target_id as targetId,b.user_name as userName from maoding_web_project_task_responsibler a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user b on a.target_id = b.id where a.type=1 and a.task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP by a.target_id order by a.seq
